titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to reauthorize the Kenai Mountains-Turnagain Arm National Heritage Area in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.
Kenai Mountains-Turnagain Arm National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
Kenai Mountains-Turnagain Arm National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Kenai Mountains-Turnagain Arm National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
This bill extends through FY2036 the authority of the Department of the Interior to provide any assistance for the Kenai Mountains-Turnagain Arm National Heritage Area in Alaska.
The bill also removes the limitation on the total amount that may be appropriated for the heritage area.
